details:
adjective
- constituting or like a nucleus
= example: constituting or like a nucleus
- (weapons) deriving destructive energy from the release of atomic energy
= example: (weapons) deriving destructive energy from the release of atomic energy
= synonyms: atomic
- of or relating to or constituting the nucleus of an atom
= example: of or relating to or constituting the nucleus of an atom
- of or relating to or constituting the nucleus of a cell
= example: of or relating to or constituting the nucleus of a cell
